alert.note: Alert for Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County; Marble and Glen Canyons (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 13 at 2:25PM MST until February 15 at 6:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TUESDAY TO 6 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Areas near Page and Tuba City. * WHEN...From 6 AM Tuesday to 6 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Tuesday evening commute. Strong winds could cause tree damage. Snow forecast from 6 AM Tuesday to 6 AM Wednesday: Page 1 to 3 inches Tuba City 1 to 2 inches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County; Marble and Glen Canyons
